item.description:
Solar Fest is a fun, affordable, family-friendly weekend learning about renewable energy through workshops and listening to speakers and musical performers on stage (visit www.solarfest.org for complete info including a program schedule and to register). A beautiful area to hike, bike and/or swim if you'd like to do that on your own. Bring your own food (or purchase at the festival), mess kit, and tent for camping. Once you have purchased your Friday, Saturday, Sunday or Full Weekend pass online, please register at link below to facilitate carpooling. Contact Dave with questions.
Carpooling registration site: http://ashearer.com/p....
item.name: Fri-Sun July 16-18: Solar Fest: Renewable Energy and Arts Festival in Vermont
